marklogic.body: I doubt this is DayOne only. I had major Headaches getting my contacts synced up between my iPhone, iCloud, and Lion. They are synced now, but I do not trust myself to update them anywhere. If I update on the iCloud site, none of my changes get synced. If I update on Address Book, some of my changes get synced, Only if I update on the do all of my changes get synced. And just today, I noticed that syncing on Notes just does not work... at all. I have tried every suggestion I could find in various forums and still no - I have my notes in Lion and on the IPad - but on the iPhone - nada. "It just doesn't work" is a highly appropriate description.
